mapper.select: SELECT A.DEVICENUMBER, A.AREAID, A.AREATYPE FROM equipment_region AS A INNER JOIN circle_region AS B ON A.AREAID = B.ID WHERE B.DEVICECATCH = 0
SELECT A.DEVICENUMBER, A.AREAID, A.AREATYPE FROM equipment_region AS A INNER JOIN rectangle_region AS B ON A.AREAID = B.ID WHERE B.DEVICECATCH = 0
SELECT A.DEVICENUMBER, A.AREAID, A.AREATYPE FROM equipment_region AS A INNER JOIN polygon_region AS B ON A.AREAID = B.ID WHERE B.DEVICECATCH = 0
SELECT A.DEVICENUMBER, A.AREAID, A.AREATYPE FROM equipment_region AS A INNER JOIN route AS B ON A.AREAID = B.ID WHERE B.DEVICECATCH = 0
SELECT SECTIONID FROM route_section WHERE ROUTEID = #{param1}
